channel.title: Posts on user.exe
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on user.exe

item.title: Locked out of my Discord
item.description: So Discord locked me out. I was just going about my buisness, then I’m hit with a page that just says “something is going on here”. It forces me to verify a phone number. The only phone numbers I have are landline or VOIP. Which conveniently, Discord doesn’t allow for phone numbers. I’ll be off Discord until I can sort this out. The support team is garbage - stop taking away a large chunk of people’s lives, Discord!

item.title: Privacy on userexe.me
item.description: Warning This page is not a privacy policy. I’m not making any commitments, this might be out-of-date without notice. I wanted to make this post instead of just a boring hard to understand privacy policy. This post outlines what data I get about you, and what I do with it. Spoiler: not much. üç™ Cookies Probobly the biggest concern that poeple have right off the bat, ohno i don’t like the browser flavor of cookies.

item.title: Sign Language is HARD
item.description: So for school we have to learn sign language, and it’s quite difficult. Like very. I think. We’re using this site called sign school, which tries to make it “fun” but it’s kinda disturbing. Here’s an example: click click click me I’m not sure what it is I just want to see if my rss feed works lol

item.title: Initial Performance Tests
item.description: Took some performance tests from Google’s “Lighthouse” and thought I would share them in the first sorta actual post on this site. Mobile: click me Desktop: click me too
